title: The Bloomberg Business of Equality Summit
itunes:title: The Bloomberg Business of Equality Summit
description:
Carol is joined by Bloomberg’s Lisa Abramowicz and they speak to Chamath Palihapitiya, CEO at Social Capital, on speaking out for equality in Silicon Valley.  Stacy Smith, Founder & Director of USC Annenberg Inclusion Initiative, talks about creating the "Inclusion Rider" and what it means for women in Hollywood. Alicia Garza, Co-Founder of Black Lives Matter, discusses her grassroots efforts for equality. Carolyn Tastad, Group President NA at P&G, explains the new myths that are holding women back And we Drive to the Close withWayne Wicker, Chief Investment Officer at ICMA-RC. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Carol is joined by Bloomberg’s Lisa Abramowicz and they speak to Chamath Palihapitiya, CEO at Social Capital, on speaking out for equality in Silicon Valley.  Stacy Smith, Founder & Director of USC Annenberg Inclusion Initiative, talks about creating the "Inclusion Rider" and what it means for women in Hollywood. Alicia Garza, Co-Founder of Black Lives Matter, discusses her grassroots efforts for equality. Carolyn Tastad, Group President NA at P&G, explains the new myths that are holding women back And we Drive to the Close withWayne Wicker, Chief Investment Officer at ICMA-RC.
